title: Restaurant Manjares da Horta
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the historical center of Guimaraes that is inscripted on Unesco World Heritage City list since 2001. Formerly all vegetarian, now mixed, but continues to offer a vegetarian menu. Popular dishes are beans with seitan, vegetable lasagna, strogonoff of seitan and mushrooms. Tea is served in afternoons. Also fresh juices, desserts.
